'''Yellowed Letter''' is a letter buried in the ground, written by [[Tejima]]. It is obtained during [[The Meaning of Meaningless Waiting]] quest in [[Chapter II]], Act I of the [[Archon Quests]].

==Text==
"If we become separated during war, go wait for me in Konda Village. There'll be a safe home for us there."<ref group="Note">For the purposes of comparison, the corresponding Japanese text reads:<br />
{{Lang|mini=1|ja=「もし……戦争で散り散りになったら、紺田村で待っててください。あそこにはきっと、私たちを待ってくれる安らかな家があります。」<br />|ja_rm=
Moshi...... sensou de chiridjiri ni nattara, Konda-mura de matte te kudasai. Asoko ni wa kitto, watashi-tachi wo matte kureru yasuraka-na ie ga arimasu.}}</ref>

==Trivia==
*The preview of the letter is written in the [[Inazuma Language]].
*The text is deciphered to read:<br />''MSMSKSTRKNKNSNSUNWRTANTG<br />WKRTSMYUNMCAWSBSYHKNDMRD<br />TASKNKTWRRNIBSYGAR''
*The deciphered text does not exactly align with the Japanese language text.
